Verses: 1 apner Ebronile Seththup Ponadhai Savulin Kumaaran Kettapodhu, Avan Kaigal Thidanatrupoyitru; Isravelarellaarum Kalanginaargal.

2 savulin Kumaaranukkup Padaiththalaivanaana Iranduper Irundhaargal; Oruvanukkup Per Paanaa, Matravanukkup Per Rekaap; Avargal Benyameen Puththiraril Peroththiyanaagiya Rimmonin Kumaarargal. Peroththum Benyameenukku Aduththadhaai Ennappattadhu.
3 peroththiyar Kiththaayeemukku Odippoi, Innaalvaraikkum Ange Sanjarikkiraargal.

4 savulin Kumaaran Yonaththaanukku Irandu Kaalum Mudamaana Oru Kumaaran Irundhaan; Savulum Yonaththaanum Madindha Seydhi Yesrayelilirundhu Varugirapodhu, Avan Aindhu Vayadhullavanaayirundhaan; Appozhudhu Avanudaiya Thaadhi Avanai Eduththukkondu Odipponaal; Aval Odippogira Avasaraththil Avan Vizhundhu Mudavanaanaan; Avanukku Meviposedh Endru Per.
5 peroththiyanaana Andha Rimmonin Kumaararaagiya Rekaabum Paanaavum Poi, Isposedh Maththiyaanaththile Veyyil Neraththil Padukkaiyinmel Sayaniththirukkumpodhu Avan Veettirkul Pravesiththu,
6 kodhumai Vaanga Varugiravargal Pola, Naduveedumattum Vandhu, Avanai Vayitrile Kuththippottaargal; Pinbu Rekaabum Avan Sagodharan Paanaavum Thappi Odipponaargal.

7 avan Than Palli Araiyile Than Kattilinmel Paduththirukkumpodhu, Ivargal Ulle Poi, Avanaik Kuththik Kondrupottu, Avan Thalaiyai Vettippottaargal; Pinbu Avan Thalaiyai Eduththukkondu, Raamuzhudhum Andharaveli Vazhiyaai Nadandhu,

8 ebronilirukkira Dhaaveedhinidaththil Isposeththin Thalaiyaik Konduvandhu, Raajaavai Nokki: Idho, Ummudaiya Praananai Vaangaththedina Ummudaiya Saththuruvaayirundha Savulin Kumaaranaagiya Isposeththin Thalai; Indraiya Dhinam Karththar Raajaavaagiya Engal Aandavanukkaaga Savulin Kaiyilum Avan Kudumbaththaarin Kaiyilum Pazhivaanginaar Endraargal.

9 aanaalum Dhaaveedhu Peroththiyanaana Rimmonin Kumaararaagiya Regaavukkum, Avan Sagodharan Paanaavukkum Pradhiyuththaramaaga: En Aaththumaavai Ellaa Ikkattukkum Neengalaakki Meetta Karththarudaiya Jeevanaikkondu Naan Sollugiradhaik Kelungal.

10 idho, Oruvan Enakku Narcheydhi Konduvarugiravan Endru Enni, Savul Seththupponaan Endru Enakku Ariviththu, Thanakku Vegumaanam Kidaikkum Endru Ninaiththapodhu, Avanai Naan Pidiththu Siklaagile Kondrupottene.

11 thamadhu Veettirkul Thamadhu Padukkaiyinmel Paduththirundha Needhimaanaik Kolai Seydha Pollaadha Manusharukku Evvalavu Adhigamaai Aakkinai Seyyavendum? Ippodhum Naan Avarudaiya Raththap Pazhiyai Ungal Kaigalil Vaangi, Ungalai Boomiyilirundhu Azhiththuppodaadhiruppeno Endru Solli,

12 avargalaik Kondrupodavum, Avargal Kaigalaiyum Kaalgalaiyum Thariththu Ebronilirukkira Kulaththandaiyile Thookkippodavum, Than Sevagarukkuk Kattalaiyittaan. Isposeththin Thalaiyai Eduththu, Ebronilirukkira Apnerin Kallaraiyile Adakkampanninaargal.
